attributes.action: immediately order the publication of a list of names of MPs (of all parties) who oppose the publication of MPs expenses, as has been ordered by a High Court Judge, under the FOI Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Voters must be able to make an informed choice about who they wish to have representing them.  There are currrently MPs who wish to keep secret what they are using our taxpayer contributions, which are made under threat of criminalisation if not made, to pay for.  The people might decide that those on the list are not worthy of being in a position where they are able to vote in their own salaries and set their own levels of un-oversighted access to taxpayer contributions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
